com.tozny.e3db

Class LocalEAKInfo

  • Object
    • com.tozny.e3db.LocalEAKInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EAKInfo

    public class LocalEAKInfo
extends Object
implements EAKInfo
    An implementation of EAKInfo that can persist to a string (using encode() and load from a string (using decode(String).
